name: Shiny Gauntlet (itch)
description:
AND WE ARE ON STEAM!!!

SHINY GAUNTLET is a Dungeon Hack n Slash, Bullet Hell, Rogue-Lite Adventure.

Select your champion and explore the Gauntlet.

  • Collect weapons
  • Find enchanted rings
  • Bottle and/or consume the mysterious remains of defeated foes (if you're into that sorta thing)
  • Chase the Wily Cultist who has stolen your Shiny Shard!

FEATURES:

  • Fight your way through a randomly generated death labyrinth!
  • 20 playable classes!
  • Over 60 enchanted rings!
  • Bottle the remains of your foes and consume them later for power-ups (if you're into that sort of thing).
  • 6 Artifacts that influence the difficulty of each run!
  • A really SHINY shard!

REPORT A BUG: ghenry@spritewrench.com

Contribute to development!

  • Suggest a new ring
  • Suggest a new aretfact
